meaningMnemonic: The <radical>samurai</radical> radical and the <kanji>samurai</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: The most famous <kanji>samurai</kanji> in Japanese history was the illustrious <reading>shee</reading>p (し) samurai. He wasn't JUST a sheep who learned the ways of the sword, he would use the wool from the sheep enemies he killed to create his armor!
